features: Get a burst of freshness with every touch with Febreze Touch Fabric Spray​
Waterlily, ginger, and hinoki mix together to create the can’t-miss cool ambience of Ocean. And Mountain puts you on the trail to freshness with luxe scents of alpine, wildflower, and cedar
Breakthrough touch-activated technology stores luxe home fragrance in your fabrics and helps fight odors​
Bring elevated touchable scents to your chaise, throw pillows, and area rugs
body.description: Get your hands on a new kind of scent experience: Febreze Touch Fabric Spray uses breakthrough touch-activated scent technology to store luxe scents right in your fabrics, giving you a burst of elevated freshness with every step, pat, and fluff. It’s home fragrance unlike any other. The scent activates with every touch: whether you’re walking on carpets, wrapping yourself with your favorite blankets, or simply lounging on the furniture. Make a statement with the carefully crafted scent of waterlily, ginger, and hinoki in mesmerizing Febreze Ocean. And experience a volcanic blend of mandarin and amber mixed with the fiery zest of lava in Febreze Ember. The long-lasting luxurious freshness continuously lingers... we dare you to resist sniffing every fabric. With Febreze Touch Fabric Refresher, you can transform your home into a luxurious, touchable scent sanctuary. ​

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Breeze Freshening with Breeze is, well, a breeze, thanks to its touchably sniffable airy scent. Fresh With the airy, just-washed scent of Fresh, you’ll want this crave-worthy scent within reach. Paradise Take your nose on a tropical vacation with this fruit-forward scent—suntan not included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Mountain Smell is Amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this two pack because I LOVE the purple, mountain, scent. The blue bottle also smells amazing. For some reason, I prefer the purple for my bedroom, as it seems more relaxing. The blue bottle will go a long way in the rest of the house. The scents seem like they will not be overwhelming either together or on their own, so I'll be using both of them often!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These smell amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of all the regular Febreze fragrances. They are too obvious, so people smell that signature Febreze smell and know you are hiding your funk! Lol. These work really well and smell like $30 fancy candles. I sprayed the ocean smell in my bathroom and I can smell it every time I step on the bath mat or move the shower curtain. I used the mountain scent in my bedroom, and it smells just delightful when I hop into bed. My teenager is partial to the mountain fragrance and keeps swiping it! I will definitely be buying again. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for general pet odors and closet freshness
reviews.reviewText: Recently tried out the Febreze Touch Fabric Spray, and it's a winner. Both bottles arrived leak-free, well-packed. The blue one handles general pet smells in my house, leaving a crisp, clean vibe – perfect for my couch. The purple bottle adds a delightful floral touch, exactly what I was looking for to freshen up my closet. What I love most? It's safe for fabrics and I appreciate the cleaner label – straightforward freshness without the worry. Solid choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used one and spray wouldn’t work after only a few sprays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deodorize my bed sheets and pillows
reviews.reviewText: Leaves a strong deodorizing layer of scent to anything I spray it on. But the scent doesn't last that long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars REMINDS ME OF AFTERSHAVE OR MEN'S COLOGNE
reviews.reviewText: I thought this package was reminiscent of men's toiletries as I sprayed my down comforter with them at different times. I sensed that getting into bed had a comparable response to a cat using the litterbox when scent was released from the litter when the cat stepped on it. Interesting concept and a pleasing one, but in the future I'll seek a more floral spray. The scent is mild and does last several days but was more stimulating than restful. There is also a "light scent" spray that I like as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They Smells good but the spray bottles leak as you’re spray them from the handle all over your hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the scents, and delivery was fine. But on one of the bottles the nozzle is broken. It sprays and also drips like crazy from the handle when you squeeze it.
